message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal, as it's worth significantly more to you than that. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,500 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $13,250?  I'm confident you'll still get great value at that price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and go with $12,750. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I'm getting the feeling we're not going to see eye-to-eye on this. While I appreciate your efforts, $12,750 is still too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000 as a final compromise. This is a fair price considering the value you'll receive from the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I understand your concerns, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,900, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?
